greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is k-th smallest divisor of n that is highly composite (A002182).
comment: Row n contains A181801(n) numbers. T(n,k) * A180803(n, A181801(n)-k+1) = n.
Row n is identical to row (n+12) if n is not a multiple of 12.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Highly composite number
example: 8 has four divisors, of which three (1, 2 and 4) are members of A002182. Row 8 therefore reads 1, 2, 4.
results.author: _Matthew Vandermast_, Nov 27 2010
